alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 12:09PM PST until November 08 at 1:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Parts of the Morongo Basin including Yucca Valley and Morongo Valley. * WHEN...Until 300 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding along State Route 62 in Morongo Valley and Yucca Valley. Additional flooding in low-lying and washes is likely. Water over other nearby roadways is also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1205 PM PST, Spotters reported instances of flooding along State Route 62. Between 0.25 and 1 inch of rain has fallen in and around the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Yucca Valley and Morongo Valley. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
